name: Baer
description:
You are a bear. You have a gun. SURVIVE!

- Explore the large and varied map.
- Fight the evil hunters with the engaging combat mechanics.
- Eliminate all competition to become to true dominant species.

Controls:

         Gamepad:

          Left Joystick to move

          Right Joystick to move camera

          B button (South Button) to jump

          A button to view where fish are

          Right Trigger to shoot (hold for a charge shot!)

          Left Trigger to scope

           Start button to pause

          Keyboard (Ideally use a Gamepad because keyboard controls are bad):

          WASD to move

          Arrow keys to move camera (I'm so sorry!)

          Space Bar to Jump

          Enter Key or right mouse button to Fire

          Left mouse button to scope

          P to pause

          C to view where fish are
